JOB DESCRIPTION: We have an opening for a Software Development Engineer in Test. Please find the the job description as follows:    Job Duties    analyzing user stories/use cases/requirements for validity and feasibility   execute all levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression)   Design and develop automation scripts when needed   Detect and track software defects and inconsistencies   quality engineering principals throughout the Agile product lifecycle   Skills and requirements    3+ years of experience as a Software Tester or similar role   Ability to work in a fast paced environment with minimal supervision   Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company   Familiarity working with JIRA/    Knowledge and experience with relational databases such as PostgreSQL
